entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:35 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 02:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -24.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.5°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
